name: Hologram Projector
description: Project a hologram of the user that synchronously replays the Wanderer's weapon attacks, dealing **35%** of the user's damage. Lasts for **15** seconds. **180**-second cooldown.
advancements: Tap again to transpose to the hologram's position.
Increase volt damage by 2%, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Increase damage dealt by the holograms to **50%** of the Wanderer's damage. Transposing removes control effects.
